Package org.firmata4j.firmata

Class FirmataPin

java.lang.Object
org.firmata4j.firmata.FirmataPin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pin
public class FirmataPin extends Object implements Pin
This class contains implementation of Firmata pin.
Author:
Oleg Kurbatov <o.v.kurbatov@gmail.com>

    • setValue

      public void setValue(long value) throws IOException, IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: Pin
      Sets the value to the pin. It is impossible to set a value to a pin in input mode such as Pin.Mode.INPUT or Pin.Mode.ANALOG.
      Specified by:
      setValue in interface Pin
      Parameters:
      value - the value to be assigned to the pin
      Throws:
      IOException - when setting fails due a communication issue
      IllegalStateException - when the pin is in input mode such as Pin.Mode.INPUT or Pin.Mode.ANALOG.
